Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Augusta
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Division, Austin, Chicago and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Division, Austin, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Central/Augusta.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cermak.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
